column2: “…This  section  contemplates  that  when  a  witness  is  to  be

column1: contradicted  his  attention  must  be  first  drawn  to  the  fact  of
having  made  a  previous  statement,  and
specifically, to the parts of the statement which are to be used
for  the  purpose  of  contradicting  him.  It  is  only  after  that,  the
